member.name: T:Segmentation.segment
member.summary:
The segment class provides a CLS compliant, MWArray interface to the MATLAB functions contained in the files:
D:\Git\S2B-Segmentation\Source\G_ICP.m
D:\Git\S2B-Segmentation\Source\G_ICP2.m
D:\Git\S2B-Segmentation\Source\G_mesh_segmentation_test1.m
D:\Git\S2B-Segmentation\Source\G_Normals.m
D:\Git\S2B-Segmentation\Source\G_RegionGrowingNC1.m
D:\Git\S2B-Segmentation\Source\G_RegionGrowingNC2.m
D:\Git\S2B-Segmentation\Source\G_Resolution_PCD.m
D:\Git\S2B-Segmentation\Source\G_rotm2eul.m
D:\Git\S2B-Segmentation\Source\G_tformPCD.m
member.remarks: @Version 1.0

member.name: M:Segmentation.segment.WaitForFiguresToDie
member.summary: This method will cause a MATLAB figure window to behave as a modal dialog box. The method will not return until all the figure windows associated with this component have been closed.
member.remarks: An application should only call this method when required to keep the MATLAB figure window from disappearing. Other techniques, such as calling Console.ReadLine() from the application should be considered where possible.
